data.name: MoreInfoBulletPoint
data.value: Get started now by introducing yourself:
data.comment: Bullet point text to show in welcome card.

data.name: NotLoginText
data.value: To submit your introduction, you’ll need to sign in.
data.comment: Text to show if user is not logged in.

data.name: PostInTeamButtonText

data.name: TeamConfirmHeaderText
data.value: Great! Now, tell me where to post this intro.
data.comment: Text to show as header in hiring manager notification card when clicks on approve button.

data.name: TellMeMoreButtonText
data.comment: Button text to show in hiring manager notification card.

data.name: ShareFeedbackButtonText

data.name: ViewCompleteLearningPlanButtonText
data.comment: View complete learning plan button text to show on learning plan list card.

data.name: UnSupportedBotCommand
data.comment: Text to show if bot command is not valid.

data.name: ViewLearningButtonText
data.comment: Button text to show in welcome card.

data.name: ViewLearningPlanButtonText
data.comment: View learning plan button text to show on learning plan card.

data.name: WelcomeContentText
data.value: I'll help you introduce yourself to the team and send you weekly learning plans. And, I'll respond to the following commands in this chat:
data.comment: Text to show in welcome card.

data.name: WelcomeHeaderText
data.comment: Text to show as header in welcome card.

data.name: WelcomeMessageText
data.value: Hi, I'm NEO, the New Employee Onboarding bot.
data.comment: Text to greet user with application name.

data.name: WelcomeSubHeaderText
data.comment: Text to show as subheader in welcome card.

data.name: IntroductionGreetText
data.value: Hi all, {0} here, happy to join as a part of the team. I don't really know what to say though. Please reach out to me if you have any question.:)
data.comment: Text to show as header in introduction card. {0} new hire name.

data.name: IntroductionText
data.value: Hello! we strive to create strong teams and an inclusive environment. The first step is helping our employees know one another. Take a moment to tell us about yourself. We'll share this info with the team.
data.comment: Text to show in welcome card.

data.name: MoreInfoCardSubHeaderText
data.value: Please explain what you'd like to see updated. I will send your comments to {0}.
data.comment: Title text to show as subheader in tell me more card. {0} new hire name.

data.name: NewEmployeeTitleText
data.comment: Header text to show in review introdutcion list card.

data.name: SendButtonText
data.comment: Button text to show in hiring manager notification card.

data.name: IntroductionSubmitButtonText
data.comment: Button text to show in introduction card.

data.name: ValidationMessageText
data.value: *Make sure you answer all the questions
data.comment: Text to show as validation message when user does nt fill all the required fields.

data.name: ChatButtonText
data.comment: Button text to show in team notification card. {0} new hire name.

data.name: CommentsPlaceHolderText
data.comment: Text to show as placehoder in tell me more card.

data.name: NotificationContentText
data.value: Hi everyone! Please welcome {0} to our team!
data.comment: Header text to show team notification card. {0} new hire name.

data.name: TeamNotificationHeaderText
data.comment: Text to show as header in team notification card. {0} is new hire name.

data.name: ApprovedMessageText
data.value: Your introduction is approved by your manager. Soon, he'll share it with the team.
data.comment: Text to show in task module when introduction status is approved.

data.name: AppTitle
data.comment: Application title to show in card.

data.name: IntroSubmittedMessage
data.value: Thanks so much! I've shared your intro with your manager. I'll let you know if anything else is needed.
data.comment: Text to show in chat after employee has done with introduction form.

data.name: PendingMessageText
data.value: Thank you. Your intro is pending approval from your manager.
data.comment: Text to show in task module when introduction status is pending.

data.name: SuccessfulPostedMessage
data.value: Intro successfully posted in selected channel.
data.comment: Text to show in chat after introduction has approved by manager.

data.name: IntroductionInputPlaceholderText
data.value: Type a brief intro (500 characters max.)
data.comment: Placeholder text for introduction answer textbox.

data.name: RequestMoreInfoNotificationText
data.value: Your request for more details has been sent to the employee.
data.comment: Notification message to show to user when asking for more information.

data.name: GenericErrorMessageText
data.value: Unable to reach app. Please try again in a few minutes.
data.comment: Text to show as generic error message to end user.

data.name: ErrorMessage
data.value: Something went wrong. Try again in a few minutes.
data.comment: Error message when bot throws exception or unable to perform a task (Generic error message).

data.name: ManagerUnavailableText
data.value: Your manager hasn't added the NEO bot and didn't receive your intro. Please let your manager know.
data.comment: Text to show when manager is not available.

data.name: ManagerApprovalValidationText
data.value: You have already approved this introduction.
data.comment: Text to show on Task Module for Hiring Manager if introduction is already approved.

data.name: SignInButtonText
data.comment: Text to show as sign in button text

data.name: SignInHeaderText
data.comment: Text to show as sign-in text

data.name: FeedbackHeaderText
data.value: **We would love to hear from you!**
data.comment: Text to show in share feedback card header.

data.name: FeedbackPlaceHolderText
data.comment: Text to show in share feedback text box as place holder message.

data.name: FeedbackTitleText
data.comment: Test to show in share feedback card title.

data.name: SubmitButtonText
data.comment: Text to show in share feedback card button.

data.name: NoPendingIntroductionText
data.value: There are no intros for you to review right now.
data.comment: Text to show when there is no pending introductions for hiring manager.

data.name: RequiredFieldText
data.comment: Text to show when team is not selected.

data.name: TellMeMoreInputValidationText
data.value: Comments can't be left empty. Try again.
data.comment: Text to show as validation message where hiring manager sends with empty more info.

data.name: FeedbackSuccessMessageText
data.value: Thanks for your feedback. I'll share it with onboarding team.
data.comment: Text to show on successfull feedback submit.

data.name: FeedbackRequiredFieldText
data.value: Feedback can't be empty. Try again.
data.comment: Text to show as error message if feedback is not provided

data.name: ViewReportCardHeaderText
data.value: Hey! You have feedback to review.
data.comment: Text to show as view feedback card header.

data.name: ViewReportCardTitleText
data.comment: Text to show as view feedback card title.

data.name: ViewReportUserMessageText
data.value: I've complied recent feedback from new hires in an excel document for you.
data.comment: Text to show as message in view report card.

data.name: HiringManagerBulletPoint1Text
data.value: * Review introductions - Type this to review new employee intros
data.comment: Text to show in hiring manager welcome card.

data.name: HiringManagerBulletPoint2Text
data.value: * Share feedback - Type this to share thoughts on improving the NEO experience
data.comment: Text to show in hiring manager welcome card.

data.name: HiringManagerWelcomeContentText
data.value: I help managers approve employee intros and distribute onboarding plans. Also, I respond to the following commands:
data.comment: Text to show in hiring manager welcome card.

data.name: HumanResourceBulletPointText
data.comment: Text to show in human resource welcome card.

data.name: HumanResourceWelcomeContentText
data.value: I help new employees onboard and ramp up quickly. Then, I collect feedback to share with the HR team on how the onboarding experience can be improved. I will send you a monthly feedback report.
data.comment: Text to show in human resource welcome card.

data.name: TeamWelcomeCardBulletPointText
data.comment: Text to show in team welcome card.

data.name: TeamWelcomeContentText
data.value: I help new hires meet the team and ramp up quickly. Here's what I'll do in this channel:
data.comment: Text to show in team welcome card.

data.comment: Text to show in carousel card header.

data.name: IntroductionBriefText

data.comment: Button text to show on team notification card.

data.name: MeetupTitle
data.comment: The title for the Meetup - {0} is the name of the first person that user has been matched with and {1} is the name of the user

data.name: ChatWithMatchButtonText
data.comment: Button text to initiate a chat with the person the user has been matched up with. {0} new hire name.

data.name: ErrorInUpdatingUserChoice
data.value: Something went wrong when I tried to handle your request. Bot is unable to update user details right now. Try again in a few minutes.
data.comment: Error message when bot is unable to update user detail in storage.

data.name: InitiateChatText
data.comment: Initiation chat text message.

data.name: MatchUpCardContentPart1
data.value: Hi there again, I'm {0}. A bot that pairs you with a new coworker to meet each week. This week your match is {1}
data.comment: First part of the match up card main content. {0} bot name.

data.name: MatchUpCardContentPart2
data.value: If you've got the inclination, set something up. See, meeting people *is* easy!
data.comment: Second part of the match up card main content

data.name: MatchUpCardMatchedText
data.comment: The text saying who the user has been matched up with. {0} new hire name.

data.name: MatchUpCardTitleContent
data.comment: The title text for the pairup notification adaptive card

data.name: MeetupContent
data.value: Hey there, looks like we've been matched by {0} this week. It'd be great to meet up for a coffee or a lunch or a call if you've got time.
data.comment: Content of the Meetup for the propose meeting. {0} pair up new hire name.

data.name: PausedMatchesCardContent
data.value: All set. I've resumed your matches. You can turn them off whenever you like.
data.comment: Content text for pause all matches card.

data.name: PauseMatchesButtonText
data.comment: Button text to pause pairings

data.name: ProposeMeetupButtonText
data.comment: Button text to propose the meetup with the match of the user

data.name: ResumeMatchesButtonText
data.comment: Button text to resume pairings

data.name: ResumeMatchesCardContent
data.value: I've paused your matches. You can resume them at any time.
data.comment: Content text for resume all matches card.

data.name: NoCurrentWeekPlanText
data.value: A learning plan is not available this week. Check in with your manager for more information.
data.comment: Text to show as validation message when there is no learning plan for current week.

data.name: FeedbackReportNavigationText
data.value: To view or download your report, go to the Feedback tab in this channel.
data.comment: Text to show in view feedback report card.

data.name: CurrentWeekLearningPlanNotExistText
data.value: Learning plan is not available for this week.
data.comment: Text to show as validation message when there is no learning plan available for current week.

data.name: ReviewIntroductionInvalidCommandText
data.value: New hire name can't be empty. Try again.
data.comment: Text to show as invalid review introduction command.

data.comment: Text to show as header in onboarding check list card.
